name: 3M Company
summary: 3M Company, originally the Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Company, is an American multinational conglomerate headquartered in Maplewood, Minnesota. It operates across industry, worker safety, healthcare, and consumer goods, producing over 60,000 products such as adhesives, abrasives, and iconic brands like Post-it and Scotch Tape. 3M is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker MMM and is a longstanding Fortune 500 company with a global presence.
